    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddFilmView
    AddFilmView serves to handle UI logic for the "Add Film" window for user functionality of manually adding films.
    App
    App.java: this class serves as the launching point of the main application.
    DatabaseConnection
    DatabaseConnection is the class used to establish a local connection with SQLite file(s).
    DeleteFilmView
    DeleteFilmView serves to handle UI logic for the "Delete Film" window for user functionality of removing films.
    Film
    Film is the template used by FilmModel to add a List/Collection of films in the application.
    FilmController
    FilmController serves to hold the main business logic of the application (add, delete, update, display, read data) with validation checking.
    FilmModel
    FilmModel is the class used to store all film objects used in the application as a List/Collection.
    MainController
    MainController serves as a master class to handle all logic in the application.
    MainView
    MainView serves to handle UI logic for the GUI functionality of the main window.
    UpdateFilmView
    UpdateFilmView serves to handle UI logic for the "update Film" window for user functionality of updating films.
